Summary: Acted like an R/C plane/helicopter with multiple LEDs
divs: sighting detailsi was out walking at around 10 pm michigan time when i saw an unknown object to the the westsouthwest. it acted like an r\c plane\helicopter with multiple leds of different colors, changing color every so oftenand moving horizontally in both directions. it made one dive and continued to move horizontally again. it then descended below the treetops so i could't see it anymore. about an hour after the event, a helicopter with, i think, one red light, flew over.
trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Northville
There were no other sightings in Northville on or around March 8th 2013
